sect2.title: Select Next Layers
sect2.para: The Select Next Layers command changes the layers that are currently selected. For each contiguous group of selected layers, it ends the selection at the layer below the last one selected, and removes the first selected one from the selection. When one layer is selected, this selects the next layer (the one below it).

listitem.para:
From the main menu through
Layer Stack Select Next Layers .
By using the keyboard shortcut PgDn.
